title: 3 Pools, Business center, Free WiFi Areas, Gated entrance
posting_body: ['North Arlington 1/1 $940', 'Fitness center, 3 Pools, Business center, Free WiFi Areas, Gated entrance, Perimeter fence, Assigned parking, Club house, Outdoor Grills, 3 Laundry rooms, School bus stop, Carports, Bus stop', 'Interior Amenities: W/D connections, Walk-in closets, Private patios/balconies, Cable ready, Hi-speed internet, High ceilings, Storage closet outside, Non-carpeted flooring, Ice makers, Premium Appliances, Dishwashers, Garbage disposals, Fire places, Miniblinds, Microwaves, Frost free refrigerators', 'Call/Text', 'show contact info', 'ask for Bryan- Free apartment locator, all areas, all situations, all credit.', 'Reference Ad# 572', '*pics are of model apartments at this location*', '**All information is deemed accurate but not guaranteed, pricing and policies are subject to change without notice.', 'Spirit Real Estate Group']
